title: Boutique French Countryside Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Wine & One Three-Course Dinner
description:
Welcome to a stay in the hidden heart of Gascony, where gently rolling fields stretch as far as the eye can see. This boutique retreat blends rustic heritage with refined comfort in a peaceful pocket of southwest France, feeling worlds away from the city. Nature lovers, foodies and those eager to discover an new side of the French countryside - look no further.

Family-run since 1935, Le Florida Gascony offers country-style rooms and rejuvenating wellness treatments. Venture out to explore the village of Fourcès, the historic town of Auch or the dramatic Château de Lavardens. Discover local farmers’ markets, sample artisan cheeses and try the region’s famed Armagnac.

At the heart of your stay is the onsite, Michelin-recognised restaurant, where the gourmet menu celebrates organic, locally sourced ingredients. From a succulent pork shank to a rich dark chocolate fondant, every dish is crafted with care and creativity. In summer, dine on the terrace - perfect for enjoying a wine under the stars.
